query: SELECT 'meetings' as tbl, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN mtgOrgId IS NOT NULL AND mtgOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_org FROM meetings UNION ALL SELECT 'contacts', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN contactOrgId IS NOT NULL AND contactOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM contacts UNION ALL SELECT 'tasks', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN taskOrgId IS NOT NULL AND taskOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM tasks UNION ALL SELECT 'companies', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN orgId IS NOT NULL AND orgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM companies;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2U3q1dt8GKGPLLB.root --database WN9ut9YEufdDjevBezkAVQ --execute SELECT 'meetings' as tbl, COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN mtgOrgId IS NOT NULL AND mtgOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_org FROM meetings UNION ALL SELECT 'contacts', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN contactOrgId IS NOT NULL AND contactOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM contacts UNION ALL SELECT 'tasks', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN taskOrgId IS NOT NULL AND taskOrgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM tasks UNION ALL SELECT 'companies', COUNT(*), SUM(CASE WHEN orgId IS NOT NULL AND orgId != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM companies;
